p: (ii) Preparation of Methanol Extracts (KN1 Meth, KN2 Meth, and KN3 Meth). 0.9750 g of each of the Kainari samples was extracted using 400 mL of methanol for 2 hours at 25°C and after filtration was evaporated in a rotary evaporator (R-200, Büchi, Flawil, Switzerland) and stored at −20°C until further analysis.
